title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Streaming at Scale: Advanced Media Delivery with Amazon CloudFront (NET307)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 大规模流媒体：使用Amazon CloudFront进行高级媒体分发 (NET307)
abstract: Learn how Amazon CloudFront powers high-profile streaming events with low-latency, scalable delivery. Discover how to optimize caching using embedded POPs, reduce origin load with Origin Shield, and fine-tune streaming performance. We will dive into Common Media Server Data (CMSD) techniques that dynamically adjust to network conditions, maintaining high-quality viewing experiences for global audiences. We’ll also explore integrations with AWS Elemental Media services for personalized ad delivery and multi-region origin usage. Hear from NESN on how they've leveraged these capabilities to deliver great viewing experiences for popular sporting events.
abstract_cn: 了解Amazon CloudFront如何通过低延迟、可扩展的交付为高知名度流媒体活动提供支持。探索如何使用嵌入式POP优化缓存、通过Origin Shield减少源站负载，以及微调流媒体性能。我们将深入研究通用媒体服务器数据(CMSD)技术，该技术可动态适应网络条件，为全球观众维持高质量的观看体验。我们还将探索与AWS Elemental Media服务的集成，用于个性化广告投放和多区域源站使用。听取NESN分享他们如何利用这些功能为热门体育赛事提供出色观看体验。
